languages.text:
Cybermastiff's attacks force their targets to become slowed.
Each successfull hit also inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}Chewed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cybermastiff's attacks force their targets to become slowed.
Each successfull hit also inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}Chewed{/g}.

languages.text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цели кибермастифа должны совершить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}, а в случае успеха – {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g}. Также, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели, кибермастиф накладывает на нее эффект {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}в клочья{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a Toughness resistance test. If failed, they become immobilised. If successful, they become slowed.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff hits the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

languages.text: Цели кибермастифа должны совершить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}, а в случае успеха – {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g}. Также, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели, кибермастиф накладывает на нее эффект {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}в клочья{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber mastifin saldırılarının hedefleri, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmelidir. Geçemeyenler {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Geçenler ise {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}.
Ayrıca siber mastif, hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}parça pinçik{/g} etkisi oluşturur.
languages.original_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Siber mastifin saldırılarının hedefleri, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmelidir. Geçemeyenler {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Geçenler ise {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}.
Ayrıca siber mastif, hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}parça pinçik{/g} etkisi oluşturur.

languages.text:
Los objetivos de los ataques del cibermastín deben hacer una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si la fallan, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}. Si la superan, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g}.
Además, cada vez que el cibermastín {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo, le inflige el efecto {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}en pedazos{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Los objetivos de los ataques del cibermastín deben hacer una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si la fallan, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}. Si la superan, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g}.
Además, cada vez que el cibermastín {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo, le inflige el efecto {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}en pedazos{/g}.

languages.text:
受到生化獒犬攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，若通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态。
除此之外，每当生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，都会对其施加{g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}撕成碎片{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
受到生化獒犬攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，若通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态。
除此之外，每当生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，都会对其施加{g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}撕成碎片{/g}效果。

languages.text:
Les cibles des attaques du cyber-mastiff doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Si elles réussissent, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenties{/g}.
De plus, chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible, il lui inflige {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}Charpie{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Les cibles des attaques du cyber-mastiff doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Si elles réussissent, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenties{/g}.
De plus, chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible, il lui inflige {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}Charpie{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフの攻撃ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗すると、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}となる。成功すると、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。
さらに、サイバーマスチフの攻撃がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、{g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}バラバラ{/g}になる。
languages.original_text:
Targets of cyber-mastiff's attacks have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, they become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. If successful, they become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーマスチフの攻撃ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗すると、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}となる。成功すると、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。
さらに、サイバーマスチフの攻撃がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、{g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}バラバラ{/g}になる。

languages.text:
Ziele der Angriffe des Cyber-Mastiffs müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen. Misslingt diese Probe, werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Gelingt die Probe, werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
Wenn der Cyber-Mastiff das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, belegt er es mit {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}Zerstückeln{/g}.

Additionally, whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the target, it inflicts {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}into pieces{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ziele der Angriffe des Cyber-Mastiffs müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen. Misslingt diese Probe, werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Gelingt die Probe, werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
Wenn der Cyber-Mastiff das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, belegt er es mit {g|f:b4abe53c3f894c1fb2c58d137c806279}Zerstückeln{/g}.
